conbody.p: To configure the client, instantiate a new Cluster object:
conbody.codeblock: var couchbase = require('couchbase'); var myCluster = new couchbase.Cluster('couchbase://10.4.4.1');
conbody.p: In addition to the connection string passed to the Cluster object, you can include a user name and password. The user name and password are required to perform management operations against your cluster. If you do not use the cluster management aspects of the SDK, the user name and password parameters are optional. Keep in mind that these credentials are the same ones you use to log in to the Couchbase administrator console, not those specified for the bucket itself.
